attributes.action: Stop the Planned March on Wootton Bassett by Islam4UK or any Similar Group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town of Wootton Bassett silently shows it respect for the UK's fallen Heroes.  It is not appropriate for the group Islam4UK to march in Wootton Bassett as it would be nothing more than a publicity stunt which would be disrespectful to the UK’s fallen Heroes, their families and the current serving troops.
